mapper.select: SELECT prjt_id ,prjt_name ,get_codename(prjt_stat) as prjt_stat ,smry ,purpose ,prjt_start_dt ,prjt_due_dt FROM prjt -- WHERE prjt_stat = '5E1e'
SELECT prjt_id ,prjt_name ,get_emptitle(resp_mngr_id) as emp_name ,prjt_start_dt ,get_codename(prjt_stat) as prjt_stat ,prjt_due_dt ,purpose ,smry FROM prjt WHERE prjt_id = #{prjtId}

SELECT t.task_no, p.prjt_id, get_codename(t.prjt_mat) as prjt_mat, t.task_name, t.task_start_dt, t.task_due_dt, t.prjt_mat, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task_emps te WHERE te.task_no = t.task_no) AS participants_cnt, (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE TRUNC(SUM(CASE WHEN te.cmplt= '5F1f' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /COUNT(*)) END FROM task_emps te WHERE te.task_no = t.task_no) AS progress FROM task_common t JOIN prjt p ON (p.prjt_id = t.standard_no) WHERE p.prjt_id = #{pid} AND p.cust_no = #{cno} AND t.task_type = '5A1a'
SELECT tc.task_no ,tc.dept_id ,d.dept_name ,tc.task_name FROM task_common tc JOIN dept d ON(tc.dept_id = d.dept_id) WHERE tc.cust_no = #{cno} AND task_due_dt > SYSDATE
